segments.text: Good morning , sir . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I'd like to cash this check .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . Can you show you identity ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you have any other identification ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry . I only have my driving license with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . Would you please sign your name on the back of the check ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you want your money ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you give me some in twenties and tens ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Please wait for a moment .
segments.speaker: S1
